projectDesc.p: Text encoded as part of 'The Digital "Anon": A Digital Genetic Edition of Virginia Woolf's Final Essays'. This project, funded by Leverhulme Grant ECF-2022-602, seeks to construct a TEI-XML based digital edition of the drafts of 'Anon' and 'The Reader', among the final documents Woolf wrote before her death.

p.l: Reading at Random or Turning the Page
To begin with English country before Eth.
The effect of country upon writers. Hall [Holingshed?]
The idea of the book is to find the end of a ball of
string & wind out. Let one book suggest another.
Keep to time sequence. Pass from criticism to biography.
Lives of people. Always follow the genuine scent –– the
idea of the moment. No periods': no text book.
Read very widely. Write rather from memory.
